main.name: Frank Norbert Mbah
main.description: I am a fullstack web/Blockchain Engineer, a Computer scientist, and Tech enthusiast. I develop rigidly funcntional and responsive sites with React, Redux, Express, Nodejs, MongodB, sql. I Develop Dapps with flawless connection and transaction with and to the Ethereum blochain, with solidity and Web3js/Ethers
main.bio: I am a hands-on Fullstack Web and Blockchain(web3) Engineer, quite eager to collaborate with customers to find optimal solutions, I carefully customize projects to user needs and budgets, I provide reliably actionable code and software assets for customers, that can be deployed in the cloud like aws, heroku, digital ocean and more, I love to work with teams or groups of Developers and i get along quite nicely, i learn any stack or trend with rigid mastery in a very short period of time.
main.contactmessage: Ring me up through my email, or call am always available

resume.skillmessage: I am a Full stack Javascript Developer with the latest and most secure technologies and framework, Nodejs, React, Express, MongoDB, I can also create, manage and deploy your projects on various cloud services like AWS with amplify, Digital ocean droplets, firebase projects, Heroku and more, I love to work with teams or groups of Developers and i get along quite nicely, i learn any stack in a very short period of time

education.description: The university was quite resouceful for me imbibed me with the problem solving skills i quite efficiently possess today.
